title: Cancellation Survey
description: Thank you for using our service. We would highly appreciate if you would take the time to fill our cancellation survey. This would help us improve the service.

elements.name: using_duration
elements.title: How long have you been using the service?

elements.name: using_frequency
elements.title: How often did you use the service?

elements.name: cancel_reason
elements.title: What was the main reason for cancelling the service?
choices: Ease of use was less than expected
Access to the service was less than expected
Customer service was less than expected

elements.name: satisfaction
elements.title: Overall, how satisfied were you with the service?

rows.text: Will you use our service in the future?
Will you recommend our service to others?

elements.name: service_improvements
elements.title: How can we improve our service?
